name: Arjun Das
title: Head Chef
bio: Arjun is a culinary expert known for his rich experience and precision in Italian cuisine, blending tradition with modern flair.

name: Priya Sen
title: Pastry Chef
bio: Priya crafts desserts that melt in the mouth. Her artistic presentation and delicious flavors make her cakes crowd favorites.

name: Ravi Sharma
title: Sous Chef
bio: Ravi brings fire and flavor together in every dish, specializing in fiery Asian meals loved by spice-lovers.

name: Anjali Mehra
title: Grill Master
bio: Anjali’s smoky grilled dishes bring out the authentic taste of traditional Indian BBQ with modern techniques.

name: Vikram Roy
title: Curry Specialist
bio: Vikram recreates the rich and bold flavors of Indian curries with traditional spice mixes and slow-cooked techniques.

name: Riya Chakraborty
title: Salad Expert
bio: Riya focuses on health-first cooking, crafting colorful and nutritious bowls loved by fitness-focused foodies.

name: Karan Nandi
title: Breakfast Chef
bio: Karan starts the day with perfection, serving comforting yet exciting breakfast dishes from all over the world.

name: Neha Verma
title: Fusion Specialist
bio: Neha brings global tastes together, combining India’s bold flavors with European techniques to create unique dishes.

name: Amitava Ghosh
title: Seafood Expert
bio: Amitava uses fresh fish and mustard-based sauces to deliver authentic Bengali seafood loved across generations.

name: Sneha Mukherjee
title: Kids Meal Designer
bio: Sneha blends creativity and care in every dish, designing balanced meals that kids enjoy and parents trust.
